name: Portfolio
description: My portfolio was created using Next.js, TS, Tailwind, next-view-transitions and inspired by Vercel.

name: Porsche Page
description: A dynamic web about Porsche using Vite, Swiper, Tailwind and TS. I made it based on simplicity and velocity.

name: Stoic API
description: A basic API REST that gives you a bunch of stoic quotes from the most famous stoics that have lived.
